word:
"And every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labor" (verse 8). "Ye shall know them by their fruits," Christ declared. "Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles? Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a 


                                     -336- 

corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit. A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit. Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire" (Matthew 7:16-19).
